bs-pageassignments-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of page assignments extension
pageassignments:
Special page name for page assignments
{{Identical|Assignment}}
managepageassignments:
Special page name for page assignments manager
{{Identical|Page assignments manager}}
bs-pageassignments-pref-assignedusersadd: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for additional permissions:
bs-pageassignments-menu-label: Label text for edit page assignments
bs-pageassignments-action-apiedit-descri:
Client side api module description for BS.PageAssignments.action.ApiTaskEdit to edit an assignment. Parameters:
*$1 - Page title
bs-pageassignments-column-title:
Extjs grid calumn label for Pagetitle
{{Identical|Page title}}
bs-pageassignments-column-assignments:
Extjs grid calumn label for assignments
{{Identical|Assignment}}
bs-pageassignments-column-assignedby:
Extjs grid calumn label for assigned by
{{Identical|Assigned by}}
bs-pageassignments-no-assignments: Text, when no assignments could be found
bs-pageassignments-action-log: Tooltip text to the link to the assignments log
bs-pageassignments-directly-assigned:
Text of the type of the assignment
{{Identical|Directly}}
bs-pageassignments-api-error: Text, that an error has occurred
bs-pageassignments-api-error-no-page: Error message, that the given parameter pageId was not a valid page
bs-pageassignments-api-error-insert:
Error message, that the assigmnment could not be saved. Parameters:
*$1 - Assignee Id
*$2 - Page title
log-name-bs-pageassignments: Used in [[Special:Log]], label for page assignments log
log-description-bs-pageassignments: Used in [[Special:Log]], log description for page assignments.
logentry-bs-pageassignments-add-user:
Log message, that someone assigned a page to a user. Parameter:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that assigned the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that assigned the page
*$3 - Page title
*$4 - the name of the user, that got assigned to the page
logentry-bs-pageassignments-remove-user:
Log message, that someone removed the assignment for a page from a user. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that removed the assignment
*$2 - Name of the user, that removed the assignment of the page
*$3 - Page title
*$4 - the name of the user, the assigmnet got removed from
logentry-bs-pageassignments-add-group:
Log message, that someone assigned a group to a page. Parameter:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that assigned the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that assigned the page
*$3 - Page name
*$4 - Group name
logentry-bs-pageassignments-remove-group:
Log message, that someone removed the assignment for a group from a page. Parameter:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that removed the assignment
*$2 - Name of the user, that removed the assignment
*$3 - Page name
*$4 - Group name
echo-category-title-bs-pageassignments-a:
Label for action messages, used in [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo]]
{{Identical|Page assignments}}
bs-pageassignments-notification-reason: Text of mail introduction - Label of a following list.
bs-pageassignments-notification-reason-u: User is directly assigned to a page. Item in a list of reasons, why the user gets a assignment notification.
bs-pageassignments-notification-reason-g:
User is a member of on or more groups. Item in a list of reasons, why the user gets a assignment notification. Parameters:
*$1 - Number of groups
*$2 - Group name or comma separated list of group names
notification-bs-pageassignments-assignme:
Notification summary, that someone assigned the user to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that assigned the user

*$2 - Name of the user, that assigned the page*$3 - Page title

Notification subject, that someone assigned the user to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that assigned the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that assigned the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that assigned the page
*$3 - Page title

Notification body, that someone assigned the user to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that assigned the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that assigned the page
*$3 - Page title

Notification summary, that someone removed the assignment of the user to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that removed the assigmnment of the user
*$2 - Name of the user, that removed the assignment of the user
*$3 - Page title

Notification subject, that someone removed the assignment of the user to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that removed the assigmnment of the user
*$2 - Name of the user, that removed the assignment of the user
*$3 - Page title

Notification body, that someone removed the assignment of the user to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that removed the assigmnment of the user
*$2 - Name of the user, that removed the assignment of the user
*$3 - Page title
notification-bs-pageassignments-page-mov:
Notification summary, that someone moved the page, the user is assigned to. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that moved the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that moved the page
*$3 - Page title

Notification subject, that someone moved the page, the user is assigned to. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that moved the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that moved the page
*$3 - Page title

Notification body, that someone moved the page, the user is assigned to. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that moved the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that moved the page
*$3 - Page title
notification-bs-pageassignments-page-edi:
Notification summary, that someone edited the page, the user is assigned to. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that edited the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that edited the page
*$3 - Page title

Notification subject, that someone edited the page, the user is assigned to. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that edited the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that edited the page
*$3 - Page title

Notification body, that someone edited the page, the user is assigned to. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that edited the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that edited the page
*$3 - Page title
notification-bs-pageassignments-page-del:
Notification summary, that someone deleted the page, the user is assigned to. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that deleted the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that deleted the page
*$3 - Page title

Notification subject, that someone deleted the page, the user is assigned to. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that deleted the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that deleted the page
*$3 - Page title

Notification body, that someone deleted the page, the user is assigned to. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that deleted the page
*$2 - Page title <del>Name of the user, that deleted the page</del>
*<del>$3 - Page title</del>
notification-bs-pageassignments-user-gro:
Notification summary, that someone added the user to a group, that is assigned to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that added the user to a group
*$2 - Name of the user, that added the user to a group
*$3 - link to the assignments special page
*4 - Group name or comma separated list of group names
*5 - Number of groups, the user was added to

Notification subject, that someone added the user to a group, that is assigned to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that added the user to a group
*$2 - Name of the user, that added the user to a group
*$3 - link to the assignments special page
*4 - Group name or comma separated list of group names
*5 - Number of groups, the user was added to

Notification body, that someone added the user to a group, that is assigned to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that added the user to a group
*$2 - Name of the user, that added the user to a group
*$3 - link to the assignments special page
*$4 - Group name or comma separated list of group names
*<del>$5 - Number of groups, the user was added to</del> '''(not used ?)'''

Notification summary, that someone removed the user from a group, that is assigned to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that removed the user from a group
*$2 - Name of the user, that removed the user from a group
*$3 - link to the assignments special page
*4 - Group name or comma separated list of group names
*5 - Number of groups, the user was removed from

Notification subject, that someone removed the user from a group, that is assigned to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that removed the user from a group
*$2 - Name of the user, that removed the user from a group
*$3 - link to the assignments special page
*$4 - Group name or comma separated list of group names
*$5 - Number of groups, the user was removed from

Notification body, that someone removed the user from a group, that is assigned to a page. Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that removed the user from a group
*$2 - Name of the user, that removed the user from a group
*$3 - link to the assignments special page
*4 - Group name or comma separated list of group names
*5 - Number of groups, the user was removed from
prefs-pageassignments:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for page assignments section in preferences. 
{{Identical|Page Assignments}}
bs-pageassignments-pref-permissions: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for automatic assignment of rights to assigned users
bs-pageassignments-yourassignmentsdesc: Description text for list of pages which you are assigned to.
right-pageassignable:
Describes the permission that a user needs to have to be listed as assignable user
{{doc-right|pageassignable}}
right-pageassignments:
Describes the permission that a user needs to change assignments of a page
{{doc-right|pageassignments}}
bs-usagetracker-pageassignments: Name of the descriptor used in [[Special:UsageTracker|Special:UsageTracker]] output
bs-pageassignments-assignee-special-ever:
Label for combobox list entry that assignes all users to a certain page
{{Identical|Everyone}}
